mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select * from board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regDate desc
select * from board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regDate desc limit #{page}, 10
select * from board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regDate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from board where bno > 0
